General.Name: D&O Home Collection Co Ltd
General.Description: D&O Home Collection Group Co.,LTD produces and sells sanitary ware and architectural ceramic products in China. It provides a range of products, including bathroom cabinets, toilets, bathtubs, showers rooms, showers, fittings, floor drains, sinks, and faucets. The company was formerly known as D&O Home Collection Co.,LTD. D&O Home Collection Group Co.,LTD was founded in 1994 and is based in Jianyang, China.
General.Address: New Hope International Building, Chengdu, China, 610041
